name: Erika Vikman
description: '''Erika Susanna Vikman''' ({{IPA|fi|ˈeːrikɑ ˈsusɑnːɑ ˈʋiːkmɑn|lang}}; born 20 February 1993) is a Finnish singer and songwriter. Beginning her career as a [[Finnish tango]] singer, Vikman first received recognition after winning [[Tangomarkkinat]] in 2016. She later received further nationwide attention following the release of the single "[[Cicciolina (song)|Cicciolina]]" in 2020, which became her first top five hit in Finland. Her debut [[Erika Vikman (album)|self-titled studio album]] was released the following year, and topped the charts in Finland. She {{Esccnty|Finland|y=2025|t=represented Finland}} in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2025]] with the song "[[Ich komme]]".
